long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Brotherhood Blocker" is a sophisticated tool designed to efficiently block inappropriate websites. It features language-specific prohibited keywords. Users can also manually add exceptions, enabling access to websites that the extension initially categorizes as inappropriate. However, these manual exceptions are only considered for three days. After that period, the website will be blocked again. For it to work properly, it has to be activated in Incognito Mode.
